wf_workflow_version.name: gcp certificate approval workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: This is the workflow for GCP certificate approval
wf_workflow.name: gcp certificate approval workflow

sys_variable_value.value: approval_action=^stage=Accepted^EQ
approval_action=^stage=Accepted^EQ
approval_action=^stage=Rejected^EQ

// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer=current.apply_for;
Dear ${employee_name}; The your GCP certificate has been reviewed and accepted by your supervisor / project officer. You may login to the Good Clinical Practice application to see the detail.
The certificate has been accepted by supervisor
The certificate has been accepted by supervisor
Dear ${employee_name}; The your GCP certificate has been reviewed and accepted by your supervisor / project officer. You may login to the Good Clinical Practice application to see the detail.

Your certificate has been rejected by your supervisor

Your certificate has been rejected by your supervisor

wf_activity.name: Send Email to Manager for approval

sys_variable_value.value: Dear ${manager}, The GCP certificate for ${employee_name} has been submitted to you for review, please login to Good Clinical Practice application to review the document. If you have any question, please contact NCI GCP Web Admin
Notification for certificate review
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer=current.manager_id;
Notification for certificate review

Dear ${manager}, The GCP certificate for ${employee_name} has been submitted to you for review, please login to Good Clinical Practice application to review the document. If you have any question, please contact NCI GCP Web Admin
